title: Mo Ri Shu Guang
overview: In the year of 2013, the tide of zombies outbreak exploded in everyone's homeland, humanity launches a large-scale battle in the endless nights awaiting for the arrival of the dawn.The end is approaching, is there going to be a way out for them?Their faiths were shattered into pieces and buried in ashes in the raging fire. But within the blazing fire, a newborn hope arise once again.(Source: polarbearadise)Â
